DOC.brief_summary: To investigate the skeletal effect of Thai traditional massage by examining the changes in biochemical markers of bone turnover.
DOC.brief_title: Thai Traditional Massage Increases Biochemical Marker of Bone Formation in Postmenopausal Women
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal women EXclusion Criteria: History of hyperthyroidism, thyrotoxicosis, diabetes, rheumatoid arthritis and cancer glucocorticoid or medication for osteoporosis Swelling joints
